turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order, but the tracking link isn't working. I'm getting pretty frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly help you with that. Could you please provide your order number so I can look into it?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's #1234567890. I really need to know where this package is, it's been a week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I'm checking the status of order #1234567890 now... It appears the package is currently in transit and is expected to arrive within 2 business days. The tracking information provided by the carrier is a little delayed, which might be why you're having issues. Please try again in a few hours or tomorrow morning.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, I guess I'll try again tomorrow. That's still not ideal, but at least I know it's *somewhere*. Thanks. But, uh, can you tell me why the tracking link is *consistently* broken?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, but I don't have access to the technical details regarding the tracking link issues. This would require assistance from a different support team. I can submit a ticket on your behalf and they will contact you directly.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, fine, submit the ticket. I'm really hoping this gets fixed, it's not a good look for your company.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: The ticket has been submitted. You should receive an email confirmation shortly with a reference number. We apologize for the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, I think that's all. Thanks for your help.
